mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from ${tableName}_Calendar where substr(sdate,'4','2') in ${month} or substr(edate,'4','2') in ${month}

select num,s_num,subject,content,to_char(sdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')sdate, to_char(to_date(edate)+1,'YYYY-MM-DD')edate from ${tableName}_Calendar
AND ((sdate>=#{start} AND sdate<=#{end}) OR (edate>=#{start} AND edate<=#{end}))
select s_num from studymember where userid=#{userId}
